home: Hello, welcome to my personal page, for know more about me, go to 'about' section.
about: I am a Software Developer which have curiosity in learn new things, I like new challenges in my career as learn about new technologies or read about solutions of old problems (with new approaches) and put my hands in practice. My strength points is the capability of being autodidact, I like search answers by myself. My big weakness is don't to know the time of ask help for another person (usually co-worker), I always think that I can disturb it with my problems.
